thread.title: 'Heartless' cold caller 'hounded couple to their deaths'
thread.title_full: 'Heartless' cold caller 'hounded couple to their deaths'

title: 'Heartless' cold caller 'hounded couple to their deaths'
text: 'Heartless' cold caller 'hounded an elderly couple to their deaths' by bombarding them with daily early morning sales calls and leaving them more than £74,000 in debt Barbara Stone rung John and Olga Moyle on a daily basis to swindle them She convinced them to place adverts in magazine for their French holiday home 'Frail' Mr Moyle was convinced to hand over £8,000 a month for almost a year They were forced to sell the Shropshire house where they had lived for 50 years Mrs Moyle died a month after it went on the market her husband passed four years later Stone admitted two counts of fraud by false representation but was spared jail
